name: Meteor Run GMTK
description:
This is my submission to the GMTK Game Jam based on the Theme "Only One".

This is the Web Playable Version

https://theferfactor.itch.io/meteor-run-web

This is a game where you're running away from meteors and fighting with just one Weapon... A ball.

Control The Player using the Arrow keys

Jump using the Spacebar  Key 

Fire the ball using the Left Mouse Button

And oh.. You die if the meteors hit you :D

NOTE: There is a bug when you fall off platforms, just pause by using the Escape Key and then Restart.
